alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 11:11AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden and southeastern Leon Counties through NOON EDT... At 1111 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Midway to 10 miles west of Crawfordville. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, St. Marks, Tallahassee Community College, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Midway, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Eight Mile Pond and Griffin Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon
